short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate a Parody Song in an instant from any song given as a sample.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create fun parodies from your favorite songs in an instant. Whenever you find yourself looking for fun things to do, just search in Google for your preferred song lyrics, add it to the LyricLab extension field to get an ingenious, laugh inducing parody song in seconds. Get your friends laughing and enjoying with you in no time! With LyricLab Parody Generator you can:

• Create Parody songs with a fun Title
• Copy your generated songs with a click
• Generate as many parodies as you wish

LyricLab Parody Generator was created by the same creators of LyricLab songwriting app, which has hundreds of users generating thousands of songs!

So go ahead and install this free extension, gather your friends for a fun night of Parody singing, craft a parody album, or enjoy any time you want. You won't regret it!
